snippet.title: Best laptops
snippet.description: CNET editors choose and review the best thin and light laptops, notebooks, and ultrabooks.

snippet.title: Samsung Galaxy Light
snippet.description: Buy the Samsung Galaxy Light if you're looking for Android on a budget -- just be aware that you're trading price for performance.

snippet.title: Swedish town introduces light therapy to bus shelters
snippet.description: The local energy company says the lamps will be in place at 30 bus stops throughout the northern town of Umea.

snippet.title: Belkin WeMo Light Switch
snippet.description: The Belkin WeMo Light Switch is a little expensive, but it's mostly a solid a la carte option for DIYers interested in home automation.

snippet.title: Philips Hue Lux
snippet.description: Philips announces the Hue Lux line of white light bulbs to compete with the Belkin WeMo LED Lighting Starter Set and the Connected by TCP Wireless LED Lighting Kit.

snippet.title: Light Marker
snippet.description: The new Crayola Light Marker for iPad announced at CES 2013 lets you paint, color, or draw freehand from a couple feet away from your device.

snippet.title: Stroke survivors regain vision with new light therapy
snippet.description: In honor Stroke Awareness Month, light-based therapy developers NovaVision announce successful treatment of stroke victims using its Vision Restoration Therapy.

snippet.title: Lumen Mini
snippet.description: The Lumen Mini is a bluetooth-enabled mood light that's coming to Kickstarter later this month.

snippet.title: Vizio CT15T-B1 Thin+Light Touch
snippet.description: The Vizio CT15T-B1 is a thin, nice-looking laptop with plenty of performance and battery life. But for the money, the package should be a little more complete.

snippet.title: Philips 75W Equivalent Soft White (2700K) A21 Dimmable LED Light Bulb
snippet.description: Approval from Energy Star means that the cost of these bulbs could be coming down.
